group_1.textLeft: Be careful, Ao. The water's deep.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I will.
Don't let your foot slip, Rena. Alright?

group_1.textLeft: And don’t let all those weird sea creatures@distract you enough to slip and fall, got it?

group_1.textRight: Hey, I don’t get THAT distracted!

group_1.textLeft: ...Oh, there's a sign over there.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I see it! That must be about the legend of@the mermaid!

group_1.textLeft: God, you're ridiculously hyped for this.

group_1.textRight: Of course I am!
It's so exciting to think about all the animals that@could live in the ocean!

group_1.textLeft: Mermaids aren't animals! They're completely@fictional.
Jeez, you really are childish.

group_1.textCenter: Am not! You take that back!

group_1.textLeft: Hey, this place is slippery, don't get too―
Rena?!

group_1.textRight: Hikaru!

group_1.textLeft: Ugh... bwah! It's so deep! There’s nowhere to@stand!

group_1.textRight: Agh... There’s water in my eyes, stinging!

group_1.textLeft: This rock, I can’t... grip it...
I can't climb up by myself...

group_1.textRight: Here, take my hand!

group_1.textLeft: Y-yeah...!

group_1.textRight: Here, Hikaru, let me pull you up!

group_1.textLeft: Phew... S-sorry about that, Ao...

group_1.textRight: ...I don't mean to alarm you, but...
You might want to look at the horizon.

group_1.textLeft: Now really isn't the time to take in the view―
No, wait... what the heck is that?

group_1.textRight: Is that... a dorsal fin?

group_1.textLeft: A dorsal fin? What kind of thing swims with@a... dorsal... fin...

group_1.textRight: Wh-wh-wh-what are we supposed to do?!

group_1.textLeft: There’s only one thing we CAN do! We have to@climb, NOW!
C’mon, Kaede! Summon some vines or something!

group_1.textRight: I-I can't do that so fast...!
Jeez, Hikaru! I didn't think you were so... heavy!

group_1.textLeft: Save me, Ao! You're my only hoooope!

group_1.textRight: No! It's too close!

group_1.textLeft: AAAAAAAAAH! I'M GONNA GET EATEN BY A@SHAAAAAR―!!!

group_1.textRight: [chara:120902:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]―?!
It jumped...

group_1.textLeft: What happened?!

group_1.textRight: It's not a shark... It's a dolphin!

group_1.textLeft: What do you...?

group_1.textRight: Sharks don't jump out of the water!
...Perhaps this shore’s legend originated...
From people mistaking the dolphins in the water@for mermaids.

group_1.textLeft: ...You’ve got to be kidding me!

group_1.textRight: *Sigh* That was exhausting...

group_1.textLeft: Thank you for helping me, Ao...
You too, Kaede... thanks... for pulling me out...

group_1.textRight: You're welcome!

group_1.textLeft: I apologize for misunderstanding the situation@and causing needless panic.
But I couldn’t help but notice how everything that@just happened felt like something out of a movie.

group_1.textRight: Oh, now that you mention it...

group_1.textLeft: What if we had our movie be about mermaids?
Hey...that's not a bad idea!
Maybe the main character comes to the beach@to see if the legend is true?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, that's a great idea...! It's exactly like the@start of a drama!

group_1.textLeft: I'm going to look for other exciting things we@can put in!

group_1.textRight: Same!

group_1.textCenter: What the hell?! You guys can’t go running off@like that!
